fields.name: language_speech
fields.label: Language/speech
fields.default: Fluent, intact naming, repetition and comprehension

fields.name: cranial_nerves
fields.label: Cranial nerves
fields.default:
II: Pupils equal and reactive, no RAPD
III, IV, VI: EOM intact, no gaze preference or deviation
V: Normal
VII: No facial asymmetry
VIII: Normal hearing to speech

fields.name: motor_sensory
fields.label: Motor/sensory
fields.default:
Motor: 5/5 in both upper and lower extremities
Reflexes: 2/4 throughout, bilateral flexor plantars
Sensory: Normal to touch and pin prick in all extremities
Coordination: Normal finger to nose and heel to shin, no tremor, no dysmetria
